DOC.brief_summary: To validate a new methodology, named Retinal Leakage Analysis (RLA), for mapping the human Blood-Retinal Barrier (BRB) function, in the clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a New Methodology for Mapping the Human Blood-Retinal Barrier Function
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with AMD, or Patients diagnosed with DME Age over 18 years Inform consent Cataract or other eye disease that may interfere with fundus examinations Glaucoma Dilatation of the pupil < 5 mm
